message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm afraid I can't go as low as $60. I can offer you a compromise at $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $85? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Hi Bob, I'm glad you're still interested in the product. I can see you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I can offer you a slight compromise at $110. This is my final offer, but I'm willing to negotiate a bit more if you're willing to meet me halfway
Hi Alice, I understand you're trying to stick to your price, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $95. Can you consider that?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable going as low as $95. I can offer you a slight adjustment at $115. This is my last offer, but I'm willing to listen to one more counteroffer from you

Hi Alice, I understand you're trying to hold firm on your price, but I'm really close to walking away. I'm willing to make one last offer: $90. This is my final counteroffer. If you can meet me at this price, I'll buy the product from you.

Hi Bob, I understand you're making a final offer, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm still confident that we can meet in the middle. I'm willing to offer you a slight adjustment at $108. This is my last offer, and I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me at this price

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I've reached my limit. I'm not willing to go above $90. I'm going to have to walk away if you can't meet me at this price. I'm sorry, but I think we've reached an impasse.
